新的无线生物传感器技术可以彻底改变医疗保健马尔默大学研究人员开发的无线生物传感器可以实现更加受患者控制的系统，通过智能导管、智能尿布或伤口敷料可以更早地检测到感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/New-wireless-biosensor-technology-could-revolutionize-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/New-wireless-biosensor-technology-could-revolutionize-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8357f86-7515-4cd5-b05c-4de87d325210 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 06:34:04 -0500 New wireless biosensor technology could revolutionize healthcare

共和党削减开支是否会威胁联邦艾滋病毒资助？对于某些程序，是的。国会中的共和党人正在“试图消除用于结束艾滋病毒流行的联邦资金”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Do-Republican-spending-cuts-threaten-federal-HIV-funding-For-some-programs-yes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231114/Do-Republican-spending-cuts-threaten-federal-HIV-funding-For-some-programs-yes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c38285d9-2a94-4c0e-994a-0e936e3f11c6 Tue, 14 Nov 2023 05:57:21 -0500 Do Republican spending cuts threaten federal HIV funding? For some programs, yes.

研究表明父母压力与儿童哮喘症状加剧之间存在联系昆士兰大学的研究表明，父母因经济困难而产生的压力与儿童哮喘症状加剧之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-shows-link- Between-parental-stress-and-exacerbated-asthma-symptoms-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231113/Study-shows-link- Between-parental-stress-and-exacerbated-asthma-symptoms-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=183bec31-20eb-4ee0-a24d-724c4a816bad Mon, 13 Nov 2023 22:57:11 -0500 Study shows link between parental stress and exacerbated asthma symptoms in children
